question: Rizia Rahman, who passed away recently, was the renowned novelist of which country?
explanation: Rizia Rahman (79), the renowned Bangladeshi novelist and the Ekushey Padak winning author, has passed away in Dhaka on August 17, 2019. She was born in Kolkata in 1939 and migrated to East Bengal after the partition.  Rizia wrote in all genres of creative work viz. short stories, poems, essays and children\'s fiction but she was renowned for her novels. Some of her well-known novels are as follows: Bong Theke Bangla, Rokter Okshor and Ghar-Bhanga-Ghar.
